name: Present Unboxing Simulator
description:
Present Unboxing Simulator is a Simulator about opening 5 gifts given to you on Christmas. This prototype was just testing for future projects and a little bit of practice as I have not been developing in a fair bit.

I have used some assets for making this prototype/practice easier and they are all linked below with their creator's names and description on where they were used.

Present Wrapping/Packages and Candy Canes - Made By LowlyPoly on the Asset Store https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/polycraft-christmas-tr...

Teddy Bear and the Star - Made by BRAiNBOX on the Asset Store https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-christmas-presents-low-poly-...
